main event: Multiple reports of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) were documented from various locations in March 1950, including a significant sighting over Mexico City.
interesting points: Witnesses in Mexico City reported seeing hundreds of flying saucers, with official observers using weather instruments to detect an unidentified object at 30,000 feet., An amateur photographer in California claimed to have photographed a 'weird disk' which may be the first image of a flying disk., Reports indicated sightings of a saucer-like object by trained aircraft observers in Mexico City confirming visual phenomena., Observers in Alabama described a 'saucer-like' object that they reported to military intelligence for investigation., A veteran private pilot near Washington DC reported seeing a fast-moving aluminum disk-like object in the sky.
witness description: Various witnesses including trained observers, an amateur photographer, and civilians.
